description: This file contains API helper functions for communicating with a backend service, including functions to post generate, explain, and debug requests, as well as retrieving the base URL.

methods.name: postGenerate({ prompt, language, systemPrompt, model } = {})
methods.description: Posts a generate request to the backend with prompt and optional parameters.

methods.name: postExplain({ code, language, systemPrompt, model } = {})
methods.description: Posts an explain request to the backend with code snippet and optional parameters.

methods.name: postDebug({ code, language, error, systemPrompt, model } = {})
methods.description: Posts a debug request to the backend with code, language, error, and optional parameters.

methods.name: getBaseUrl()
methods.description: Returns the current backend base URL being used.

ctags.name: postDebug
ctags.pattern: /^export async function postDebug({ code, language, error, systemPrompt, model } = {}) {$/

ctags.name: postExplain
ctags.pattern: /^export async function postExplain({ code, language, systemPrompt, model } = {}) {$/

ctags.name: postGenerate
ctags.pattern: /^export async function postGenerate({ prompt, language, systemPrompt, model } = {}) {$/
